root.name: "Aha! I Found It!" Hidden Object Game
root.description: Overview"Aha! I Found It!" Hidden Object Game is a hidden object game developed and published by Ateam Inc. for the Wii Shop and the DSiWare platforms. Over a series of ten levels, players are challenged to find twelve random objects as quickly as possible.

similar_games.game: Hot and Cold: A 3D Hidden Object Adventure
Interpol: The Trail of Dr. Chaos
